
		<h1 class="postTitle">
			<a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/insus/p/18651486" title="发布于 2025-01-04 09:49">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">HTML Select Drop Down List Data Source From Web API</span>
    

</a>

		</h1>
		<div class="clear"></div>
		<div class="postBody">
			<div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
前端，html还是mvc页面，我们想实现一个下拉选单，写&lt;select&gt;指定id或者name，稍后在js代码能获取到它。<br><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202501/28036-20250104085943917-582473178.png" alt="">
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><a href="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202501/28036-20250104090826945-848034722.png" target="_blank"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202501/28036-20250104090826945-848034722.png" alt=""></a></p>
<p>#7~#9行，没有参数条件可传，保留为空。#19 Web API地址。#21为异步方法，看下，<br><a href="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202501/28036-20250104091238599-1604660543.png" target="_blank"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202501/28036-20250104091238599-1604660543.png" alt=""></a></p>
<p>#37，是为了不让代码写在一块，Insus.NET已经重构成另一个function,也是本示例中重点核心代码，<br><a href="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202501/28036-20250104091606412-2096916594.png" target="_blank"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202501/28036-20250104091606412-2096916594.png" alt=""></a></p>
<p><br>下面继续看看，下拉选单，在编辑时，需要给下拉选单一个前期已经选择好的值，并在下拉选单呈现时，它是选中状态，<br>编辑或是详细页面，js加载数据，并把各自绑定给页面tag,<br><a href="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202501/28036-20250104092201781-519420081.png" target="_blank"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202501/28036-20250104092201781-519420081.png" alt=""></a></p>
<p>#6行，下拉选单数据绑定，<br><a href="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202501/28036-20250104092403483-163048126.png" target="_blank"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202501/28036-20250104092403483-163048126.png" alt=""></a></p>
<p>#25行,Web API地址，具体API如何写，可以参本博客前此时间的随笔。<br>#27行，已经被重构成另外单独function,仔细看来，<br><a href="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202501/28036-20250104092755836-662330609.png" target="_blank"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202501/28036-20250104092755836-662330609.png" alt=""></a></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>#41行，看到否， selectedValue参数，它是默认的下拉选单选中的值。<br><a href="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202501/28036-20250104093155527-534663144.png" target="_blank"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202501/28036-20250104093155527-534663144.png" alt=""></a></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>#59行，从下拉选单的数据源中，判断键值与selectedValue相同，即在生成option时，添加selected。<br><br>基本上完成了，非编辑与编辑，Insus.NET使用不同语法动态生成下拉选单的option。<br><br>最后来个动态演示，<br><a href="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202501/28036-20250104094838499-1777464804.gif" target="_blank"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202501/28036-20250104094838499-1777464804.gif" alt=""></a></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
</div>
<div class="clear"></div>
